clinical_study.brief_title: Characterization of Laryngeal Contact Granulomas: Retrospective Analysis of Symptoms, Promotive Factors and Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Characterization of Laryngeal Contact Granulomas: Retrospective Analysis of Symptoms, Promotive Factors and Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective analysis of data from patients with laryngeal contact granulomas in order to identify possible differences and/or similarities between the cases and in order to determine whether and which conclusions can be drawn on disease and therapy.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a retrospective analysis of data from patients with laryngeal contact granulomas in order to identify possible differences and/or similarities between the cases and in order to determine whether and which conclusions can be drawn on disease and therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with similar therapy outcome as a measure of therapy predictability
primary_outcome.time_frame: 4 to 6 months after finishing the therapy
primary_outcome.description: Data from patients with laryngeal contact granuloma are analyzed retrospectively as to wether similar pathologies and treatment lead to similar outcome.

study_pop.textblock: Former patients with laryngeal contact granuloma who were treated in this hospital.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
Laryngeal contact granuloma in adults with documentation of symptoms, possible causes, therapy and outcome
Exclusion criteria:
Incomplete information on the diagnosis laryngeal contact granuloma (symptoms, promotive factors, findings)
